hireposition_time, is_general, work_status, salary_level, salary_grade, work_year, retirement_pay_scale, create_at, create_id, update_at, update_id, state, remark ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{busiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{documentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{section,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personnelCompilation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compilationDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapper.delete:
update document_infor set state = '99' where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
select
from document_infor where busi_id = #{busiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and state = '1'

select p.identification_no,p.name,p.sex,p.used_name,p.cellphone,p.office_phone, p.agency_id,p.agency_name,p.city_code,p.town_code,p.district_code,p.nationality, p.nation,p.birthday,p.start_work_time,p.join_party_time,p.political_affiliation, p.native_place,p.status, a.document_code,a.dept_code,a.section,a.birth_place,a.address,a.personnel_compilation, a.compilation_dept,a.person_type,a.is_secondment,a.second_dept_code,a.second_section, a.retired_date,a.initial_education,a.initial_education_desc,a.highest_education,a.org_time, a.management_level,a.health,a.profession,a.professional_sort, a.profession_level,a.health_technical_title,a.nonhealth_technical_title, a.technical_position,a.technical_position_desc,a.technical_time,a.hireposition_time,a.is_general, a.work_status,a.salary_level,a.salary_grade,a.work_year,a.retirement_pay_scale, b.*,c.* from org_personnel p left join document_infor a on p.identification_no=a.identification_no and p.is_delete=0 and a.state='1' left join ( SELECT relation_id as b_relation_id, name as b_name,unit_name as b_unit_name ,department as b_department, position_level as b_position_level,date_begin as b_date_begin,is_leader as b_is_leader,state as b_state FROM document_administrative_post t WHERE ( date_begin = (SELECT MAX(date_begin) FROM document_administrative_post p WHERE relation_id = t.relation_id and p.state='1' and t.state='1' ) ) )b on a.identification_no=b.b_relation_id and b.b_state='1' and a.state='1' left join ( SELECT relation_id as c_relation_id, name as c_name,unit_name as c_unit_name ,department as c_department, position_level as c_position_level,date_begin as c_date_begin,is_leader as c_is_leader,state as c_state FROM document_innerparty_post t WHERE ( date_begin = (SELECT MAX(date_begin) FROM document_innerparty_post p WHERE relation_id = t.relation_id and p.state='1' and t.state='1' ) ) ) c on a.identification_no=c.c_relation_id and c.c_state='1' and a.state='1'
state = '1'
group by a.identification_no
mapper.insert:
insert into document_infor( id,dept_code,section,idnumber,name,sex,birthday, personnel_compilation,person_type, work_status,work_time,org_time, is_secondment,second_dept_code, second_section,profession,state )
( select #{item.id}, #{item.deptCode}, #{item.section}, #{item.idnumber}, #{item.name}, #{item.sex}, #{item.birthday}, #{item.personnelCompilation}, #{item.personType}, #{item.workStatus}, #{item.workTime}, #{item.orgTime}, #{item.isSecondment}, #{item.secondDeptCode}, #{item.secondSection}, #{item.profession}, '1' from dual )
